output_stories.story_text_normalized: this is a picture of the city where we stayed on vacation . not far from us was this majestic mountain . this is where we had to park our rental car . one of the attractions near where we parked . thankfully there was a starbucks there !

i thought i spotted something off in the distance . as it got closer i thought it did n't look like any bird i had seen in person before . then it got close and i could see it was a dragon . we were scared so we took a huddle to make a game plan . then it occurred to me to call the vampire . he would know what to do .
